aircraft.value: Ghost Recon - AC-2414-800 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Compressor stall during acceleration. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 25/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 27/06/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 30/06/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 01/07/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 04/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
